com.ihealth.communication.control

Class UpgradeControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.UpgradeControl

  • public class UpgradeControl
extends java.lang.Object
    自升级管理类(兼容新老自升级协议)

    Created by lixuesong on 2017/8/2.

    • Method Summary

      void downloadFirmwareFile(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String productModel, java.lang.String hardwareVersion, java.lang.String firmwareVersion)
      Download the firmware file This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action will be: UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_START_DOWNLOAD UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_DOWNLOADING UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETED The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action. If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
      the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.

      • queryDeviceFirmwareInfo

        public void queryDeviceFirmwareInfo(java.lang.String mac,
                                    java.lang.String type)
        Query the firmware firmware information
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_INFO
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - Mac address
        type - Device Type

      • queryDeviceCloudInfo

        public void queryDeviceCloudInfo(java.lang.String type,
                                 java.lang.String productModel,
                                 java.lang.String hardwareVersion,
                                 java.lang.String firmwareVersion)
        Query device cloud upgrade information
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_CLOUD_FIRMWARE_VERSION
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the device.
        productModel - The product model
        hardwareVersion - The product hardware version
        firmwareVersion - The product firmware version

      • downloadFirmwareFile

        public void downloadFirmwareFile(java.lang.String type,
                                 java.lang.String productModel,
                                 java.lang.String hardwareVersion,
                                 java.lang.String firmwareVersion)
        Download the firmware file
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_START_DOWNLOAD
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_DOWNLOADING
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETED
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the device.
        productModel - The product model
        hardwareVersion - The product hardware version
        firmwareVersion - The product firmware version

      • startUpgrade

        public void startUpgrade(java.lang.String mac,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String productModel,
                         java.lang.String hardwareVersion,
                         java.lang.String firmwareVersion,
                         java.lang.String fileCode)
        Start to upgrade for the specified device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_START_UP
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_PROGRESS
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_FINISH_UP
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_PAUSE
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.
        productModel - The product model
        hardwareVersion - The product hardware version
        firmwareVersion - The product firmware version
        fileCode - The local firmware file is unique

      • isUpgradeState

        public boolean isUpgradeState(java.lang.String mac,
                              java.lang.String type)
        Get device upgrade state.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.
        Returns:
        true if device is in upgrade progress, false if not.

      • stopUpgrade

        public void stopUpgrade(java.lang.String mac,
                        java.lang.String type)
        Stop upgrade for specified device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If stop successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_STOP_UP.
          • The message will be null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.

      • stopDownload

        public void stopDownload(java.lang.String type)
        Stop download file for specified device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If stop successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_STOP_DOWNLOAD.
          • The message will be null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback#onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the device.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()

      • deleteFile

        public org.json.JSONObject deleteFile(java.lang.String fileCode)
        delete firmware file for specified device. *
        • The messageis UpgradeProfile.DELETE_FILE_RESULT.
        • The messageis UpgradeProfile.DELETE_FILE_FAIL_REASON.
        Parameters:
        fileCode - The local firmware file is unique
        Returns:
        delete file result
